name: Vestments of the Oracle
tooltip:
Vestments of the OracleLevel 60

Bring the the Husk of the Old God, 2 Idols of Death, 5 Stone Scarabs and 5 Crystal Scarabs to Vethsera inside Ahn'Qiraj.  You must also attain Honored reputation with the Brood of Nozdormu to complete this quest.

Requirements:
- Husk of the Old God
- Idol of Death x 2
- Stone Scarab x 5
- Crystal Scarab x 5
- Brood of Nozdormu:
